article_title: Clydesdales return to Anheuser-Busch Tour Center
article_text:
The leading pair of the Budweiser Clydesdales nuzzle one another while making in downtown Loveland last year. The Budweiser Clydesdales are returning to the Anheuser-Busch Fort Collins Brewery Tour Center and will be available for pictures at 1-3 p.m. Saturday. (Reporter-Herald file photo)

FORT COLLINS — The Clydesdale horses return to the Anheuser-Busch Tour Center on Monday.

The horses will be in the area through March 22, and the public will have two chances to visit with them.

A Clydesdale Camera Day will take place at 1-3 p.m. Saturday at the facility at 2351 Busch Drive. The public is invited to visit the horses and bring cameras.

They also will be present at a Meet the Brewmaster event at 3:30-5 p.m. Friday, March 21.

For details, call 490-4691 or visit www.facebookcom/ftcbudtours.
